title: Apple Inc. stock underperforms Tuesday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -4.09%
       shed 3.58% to $185.64 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.68%
       rising 0.07% to 37,715.04 and the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.20%
       falling 1.63% to 14,765.94. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Apple Inc. closed $13.98 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        +0.97%
       fell 1.37% to $370.87, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        -0.63%
       fell 0.97% to $139.56, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        -0.77%
       fell 1.09% to $138.17. Trading volume (79.8 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 53.4 M.
